SVGAttributePointsAtZ.summary: The pointsAtZ attribute represents the y location in the coordinate system established by attribute {{SVGAttr("primitiveUnits")}} on the filter element of the point at which the light source is pointing, assuming that, in the initial local coordinate system, the positive z-axis comes out towards the person viewing the content and assuming that one unit along the z-axis equals one unit in x and y.

remarks.para: You can use this attribute with the following SVG elements:
